title: Bots Overrunning Twisted Treeline
body:
I recently made a new smurf account, playing the cancerous champion riven.


I decided to run 3v3 with one of my friends, when we saw literally 4 other bots that have the same, very similiar name, and would just run down lane and die.
Holy shit man, I'm not complaining (because I got really fed that game and got me a key fragment) but there are literally NO real players on TT, atleast for very low levels like me.

replies.body:
Very sorry to hear that you had to experience that >.<  We are actively identifying and banning bot accounts as much as possible to make sure other players don't have a similar experience to yours.  

I wish I could do more to help!  We will do everything we can to identify these accounts however.

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=79udr08T,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-23T23:23:58.947+0000)
>
> Very sorry to hear that you had to experience that >.<  We are actively identifying and banning bot accounts as much as possible to make sure other players don't have a similar experience to yours.  
> 
> I wish I could do more to help!  We will do everything we can to identify these accounts however.

They're running rampant in 5v5 intermediate bots as well.

It's actually so bad that on my smurf I had to play a 2v5 (me, one new player, and 3 bots). Took me 42 minutes to win that game....
